documentation.text: @title Interface to be implemented by all permission manager modules

@notice Used to delete a delegate
 @param _delegate Ethereum address of the delegate

@notice Used to get the Permission flag related the `this` contract
 @return Array of permission flags

@notice Used to get all delegates
 @return address[]

params._details: Details about the delegate i.e `Belongs to financial firm`

params._module: Ethereum contract address of the module
params._valid: Bool flag use to switch on/off the permission

params._modules: Multiple module matching the multiperms, needs to be same length
params._perms: Multiple permission flag needs to be changed
params._valids: Bool array consist the flag to switch on/off the permission

params._module: Ethereum contract address of the module
Ethereum contract address of the module

getAllModulesAndPermsFromTypes(address,u.details: possible that function get out of gas is there are lot of modules and perm related to them

returns._0: address[] the address array of Modules this delegate has permission
returns._1: bytes32[] the permission array of the corresponding Modules

devdoc.title: Interface to be implemented by all permission manager modules

changePermission(address,address,bytes32.notice: Used to provide/change the permission to the delegate corresponds to the module contract

changePermissionMulti(address,address[],.notice: Used to change one or more permissions for a single delegate at once

checkDelegate(address).notice: Used to check if an address is a delegate or not

checkPermission(address,address,bytes32).notice: Used to check the permission on delegate corresponds to module contract address

getAllDelegatesWithPerm(address,bytes32).notice: Used to return all delegates with a given permission and module

getAllModulesAndPermsFromTypes(address,u.notice: Used to return all permission of a single or multiple module

getPermissions().notice: Used to get the Permission flag related the `this` contract
